categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Flash" was the nickname of a clone trooper who served in the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. He accompanied Clone Commander Bly, Cameron, Lucky, Clone Captain Rex, Anakin Skywalker, Ahsoka Tano, and Aayla Secura to Maridun, where he later died along with Cameron and Lucky when their group was attacked by mastiff phalones.
